section.name: PMD
section.subsection: Runs a set of PMD rules on a set of files and generates a report.

tr.td: The file to which the report is written.
Verbose output - just the name of each file processed Defaults to the current directory.
The set of rules to use (all, general, cougaar)

subsection.name: Examples
subsection.source: <target name="pmd"> <taskdef name="pmd" classname="com.infoether.pmd.PMDTask" /> <pmd reportFile="C:\foo.txt" verbose="false" rulesettype="general"> <fileset dir="C:\j2sdk1.4.0\src\"> <include name="**/*.java"/> </fileset> </pmd> </target>
